messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Kyle Chandler/Mr. Bean
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/03 8:46:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time, unolist@aol.com ... Well I just got home from the hospital and have a good 500 emails to look at,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/03 8:46:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time, unolist@...
writes:

> look at this one, MUCH better, not mr beanish at all
>
> http://www.angelfire.com/ab4/eel/
>
>

Well I just got home from the hospital and have a good 500 emails to look at,
but thanx for these on Kyle C/Mr. Bean. They have lifted my spirits
tremendously.I have to agree this pic was much better, but the first one did make me
laugh. Wouldn't it be a hoot if Kyle turned out to be Mr. Beans son or
something. LOL

Thanx for the cheer!
Rhonda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler/Mr. Bean
messages.messageBody:
<<BTW, Jen, when I clicked on your link a giant full screen porno site
came up first with your web site "behind" it in another window. Just so
you don't send an aged Aunt to your site without warning. LOL>>

<<Did you happen to open up Mary's Mr. Bean picture first? Because when I
opened it I got a bunch of porn pop-ups too. That better not be happening
to my site or I'm gonna have a few choice words with Yahoo!>>



Oh heavens Jennifer they found us out. Now they know what we do with all the
oodles of spare time we have!!! Sending porn sites to unsuspecting
unschoolers!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler/Mr. Bean
messages.msgSnippet: Ah jeez, sorry about that!  I hadn t really thought of you
messages.messageBody:
<<I am afraid that when we see him again i will be exploding inside with
images of Mr. Bean.>>

Ah jeez, sorry about that! I hadn't really thought of you having to
actually FACE the man! LOL

I guess I'll just have to hope I don't meet him...Kyle that is...because
he'd probably slap me if I was pointing and guffawing and peeing in my pants
in front of him! ROFL!

Jennifer

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler/Mr. Bean
messages.msgSnippet: I just went to the farm (it s on my MILs property 5 min away) to get the kids, told DH about the Kyle - Mr. Bean connection and asked him what he thought.  He
messages.messageBody:
I just went to the farm (it's on my MILs property 5 min away) to get the kids, told DH about the Kyle - Mr. Bean connection and asked him what he thought. He is so wonderfully innocent; makes him a great unschooling father. He said " I just wouldn't want Kyle to think it's a bad thing." I said, "How would he ever know? Do you think there is any chance of him ending up at this list or someone's personal web site?" He said, " No, I will tell him." (laughing at me for imagining it's a big deal to do so). I think DH likes Rowan Atkinson (Mr. Bean) so much that he doesn't see the possible insult, just doesn't even see it. (He was just concerned about comparing them as people. WHAT?! They are in diffent worlds) I love that! Though I will discourage him from passing this all on to Kyle. I am afraid that when we see him again i will be exploding inside with images of Mr. Bean. You have sooo cracked me up!

jmcseals SEALS <jmcseals@...> wrote:There were better ones but they all looked errily like Mr. Bean to
me....whom I love too! I'm not saying they are identical or anything but
man, I can't help but see the likeness! I'm TRYING to see the doability in
Kyle but there stands Mr. Bean in my brain and I just DIE laughing! Let me
know what your hubby thinks!

Jennifer...who has a Chloe Madeleine...pretty name!

AAAAHHHHH!!! ROFLMAO! Ouch, ouch, ouch! OMG this is SOOO Funny! I'm
sorry, but the picture had to slowly come up and the first thing I saw was
the forehead wrinkles and the eyebrows.....I'm warped...all I see is Mr.

I can't stop....laughing.....to get....past it......OUCH!

Jenniferf

Feeling childish and loving it!

Here it is http://www.motherlymusings.com/KyleBean.html

Jennifer
